attributes.action: use his influence to prevent the BBC from closing down or selling off 6Music Digital Radio station.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We seek to prevent the BBC from either closing down, selling off or merging 6 Music.
The station fulfills the original BBC mission of entertaining and educating and has proven itself invaluable to the development and exposure of new and interesting music acts.Closure would be a short sighted and retrograde step serving to disenfranchise a clear segment of thye population and please nobody but Mr.Murdoch.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
